mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM project p ORDER BY p.id DESC
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM project p WHERE p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY p.id DESC
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM project p WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (name, description, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{createdAt})
